title: #StayStill2020 Pt. I with Dro Greindstein
description:
If you’re reading this, it’s not too late to #StayStill2020. Don’t move a muscle, sit your punk ass down, get lit and pay attention as Jimmy and Larry dial in the Hood Swiss Army Knife™ and Throw Gang spiritual advisor, the legendary Dro Greindstein of Def Jam. Barz abound as Dro and the boys chop it up on staying mobile in the kitchen during quarantine, why Throwing Fits has the best fans on earth, the show’s first ever weed check, trying to reconcile home mode and grind mode, praying for all the parents out there, Mike Amiri’s hood pass, Pop Smoke’s winning formula, being raised by mobsters, owning a pair of $20,000 sneakers, Kobe’s legacy, Drake’s crib, the target on 6ix9ine’s back, doing whatever makes you happy and much more.
 
For more Throwing Fits, check us out on Patreon: www.patreon.com/throwingfits.
dc:creator: Throwing Fits
